description:
The Grid Base Layer Crewneck is one of our newest innovations for all your outdoor adventures. Designed with a focus on warmth and comfort, this base layer is the perfect addition to enhance your experience during hunting or activities that require low to medium-high intensity in cooler climates.

This 100 % recycled polyester base layer is environmentally conscious and highly functional. The 4-way stretch grid-textured fleece fabric provides excellent insulation by trapping heat close to your body, ensuring optimal warmth in harsh conditions. Additionally, the fabric's moisture-wicking properties efficiently draw sweat away from your skin, keeping you dry and comfortable throughout your physical effort.

They have paid attention to the finer details, constructing the base layer with flatlock seams. This construction method minimizes discomfort and chafing, guaranteeing a smooth and irritation-free experience.

To combat odors and bacteria buildup, we have incorporated the SilverClear® antimicrobial treatment. This treatment ensures high efficacy against odors and bacteria, to stay fresh even during extended wear.
name: Hooke Grid Base Layer Crewneck - Mens
